## Report

### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5), (51.5, -79.5), (53.5, -79.5), (55.5, -79.5), (60.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5), (41.5, -76.5)

#### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-29.5, -49.5), (-18.5, -48.5), (-17.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-13.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-11.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), (-7.5, -48.5)

#### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -47.5), (-17.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5)

#### Iron Plate Transfer Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)
- Iron Chests at positions (-12.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5), (-8.5, -45.5), (-12.5, -43.5), (-10.5, -43.5), (-8.5, -43.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-11.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when Extracting Items with Insufficient Quantity
- Ensure that the quantity of items to extract is greater than zero before attempting extraction. Check the inventory of the source entity to confirm available quantities.

#### Errors with Full Chests
- Regularly monitor and empty chests that are full to prevent interruptions in mining and production processes. Consider using additional storage or automating the transfer of items to prevent overflow.

#### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Verify that the inserter's pickup position is correctly aligned with the source entity's drop position.
